summary: The module supplies command‑line utilities and supporting helpers for training and running inference of a tag‑based inverse text normalization model using NVIDIA NeMo. It leverages Hydra for configuration, handles dataset loading, batching, model instantiation, and writes normalized results to files.
business_intent: To streamline the development and deployment of inverse text normalization solutions, enabling speech and language applications to automatically convert spoken‑style text into its correct written form.
